law.catch_line: This section does not apply to:...

text.section:
This section does not apply to:
a physician licensed to practice medicine;
a government unit; or
the otherwise lawful conduct of business between commercial, medical, pharmaceutical, scientific, or government units.

Except in accordance with a prescription written by a physician licensed to practice medicine, a person may not sell, dispense, or give to another a drug, medicine, preparation, substance, or a preparation containing a sulfonamide drug to alleviate, treat, or cure venereal disease.

section.section:
A prescription under subsection (b) of this section shall include:
the physician's signature and address; and
the date the prescription was written.

text.section:
A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding:
$50 for the first violation; and
$250 for each subsequent violation.
